1443150.name: DC Universe Online™ - Episode 39: Long Live The Legion
1443150.description:
Join forces with the future’s bravest team, the founding members of the Legion of Super-Heroes! Lightning Lad, Saturn Girl, and Cosmic Boy’s lives are in jeopardy as they confront one of the most powerful sorcerers in the universe, Mordru.

Travel to 31st Century: New Earth, a new open-world area where Validus and the Emerald Empress, members of the notorious Fatal Five, are wreaking havoc in future Metropolis. Visit Legion HQ in the four-player Alert to prepare a coordinated assault with this new assembly of century-spanning heroes. Then take the fight to Mordru in the eight-player raid, where you and the Legion of Super-Heroes are the last line of defense to save everyone: present and future!

Key Features:

  • New characters including Lighting Lad, Saturn Girl, and Cosmic Boy!
  • 31st Century Metropolis includes more content and rewards with no loot locks.
  • Face new and updated bosses like Validus, Emerald Empress, and Giant Mordru.
  • Earn new Rewards inspired by Cosmic Boy, Emerald Empress and Static.
